desc: 100% boost to Atk, Def, considerably boosts OD gauge fill rate, boosts Atk and Def by 40% relative to max HP, 70% boost to Spark damage, boosts critical hit damage, boosts BB Atk & lowers max HP by 40%

dictionary.lore: As corruption and hedonism rose within the kingdom, Malachus's followers hardened hearts and sowed indecision throughout the land. Tempers grew short and arguments flared for the simplest of reasons, adding fuel to the fire of revolution already overflowing at the seams. Meanwhile, thousands of innocents were falsely condemned by her cultists as demon-worshippers, further weakening the morale of the people. Her view of her rivals was thus: "So pathetically boring. Malekhan likes to count his victories before they even come to pass - which makes his disappointment that much sweeter."

name: Avaricious Torment
